meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Michelle Souza Buddy Hammett Barbara Sheridan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6527.

td.p: Michelle Souza, a costume designer from San Diego, California
Buddy Hammett, a customer service specialist from Douglasville, Georgia
Barbara Sheridan, an attorney and law clerk to a judge from Yonkers, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $17,999)

tr.td: IF THE SHOE FITS...
ART & ARTIST
THE "B" TEAM
WEIGHTS & MEASURES
NOUN; VERB
I'M DYING HERE!

spikes

')
